entries.meaning: (rail transport, US) An enclosed railway goods wagon, typically with a sliding door.
examples: Synonyms: (formal in the UK) covered goods wagon, (British and Australian English:) goods van, box van, van

verbs.description: boxcar (third-person singular simple present boxcars, present participle boxcarring, simple past and past participle boxcarred)

entries.meaning: (mathematics, transitive) To reduce to a boxcar function.
